metadata.dc:description: We present a case of a 70-year-old woman with a giant mass of mediastinum. A complete resection of the tumor from the left pleural cavity and posterior mediastinum was made through a posterior–anterior left thoracotomy. The mass weighted 2,495 g and its dimensions were 23 x 19 x 18 cm. The final diagnosis was consistent with a myxoid liposarcoma (MLS), and negative microscopic margins. 6 months after the surgical excision, the patient presented with a distal recurrence and she died after 11 months (AU)

metadata.dc:description: Presentamos un caso de una mujer de 70 años con una masa mediastínica gigante. Se le practica toracotomía para resección quirúrgica con resultado anatomopatológico final de una masa tumoral de 23 x 19 x 18 cm, que pesa 2.495 g, con diagnósticos de liposarcoma de tipo mixto que respeta los bordes quirúrgicos. A los 6 meses aparece recidiva tumoral a distancia y la paciente fallece a los 11 meses de la cirugía (AU)
